From: Pedro Sánchez Terraf <sterraf@famaf.unc.edu.ar>

Best wishes,

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>

On 1/2/23 15:52, Florian Haftmann wrote:

A possible target seems to be
https://lists.cam.ac.uk/sympa/arc/cl-isabelle-users

I have made some updates, both for the mailing list and Stack Exchange. Right
now it is on https://isabelle.in.tum.de --- the other mirrors may require more
time.

Makarius
